text: Awaroa may refer to the following in New Zealand: * Awaroa, the Māori name for Godley Head in Christchurch * Awaroa River, a river in the Northland Region * Awaroa River (Waikato River tributary), a river in Waikato flowing into the Waikato River * Awaroa River, a river in Waikato flowing into Kawhia Harbour
title: Awaroa
